choose.when: select no, title, contents, hit, reg_Date,g_no,o_no,depth,user_no from board order by g_no desc , o_no asc limit #{startOffset }, #{size }
select count(*) from board order by g_no desc , o_no asc , no
choose.otherwise: select count(*) from board where title like '%${_parameter }%' or contents like '%${_parameter }%' order by g_no desc , o_no asc , no

mapper.select: select no, title, contents, hit, reg_Date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no from board where no = #{no}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} where no = #{no}
update board set o_no = (o_no+1) where g_no = #{gNo} and o_no > #{oNo}
